A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Very fun and well paced movie that fits in nicely with the Star Wars Universe. Slightly disappointed with the lack of use of Snoke and the reveal of Rey's parents this felt rushed and not organic at all. The character development of both Rey and Kylo Ren was well done and Luke as a Jedi Master was interesting but not as well developed as it could have been. 

There were some excellent moments that excited and surprised but there were a few too many rushed and throw away moments that left me feeling disappointed with the script. 

As for humor I found this the most fun Star Wars movie to date and didn't expect to laugh as much as I did.

All in all a good movie and a definite step on from the Force Awakens but still a little away from the OT. For my kids though this had the same impact on them as Empire had on me so for the new generation I think this film is a success.
